scripts.build: prisma generate && npm run lint && npm run test && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-secret DATABASE_URL=postgres://user:pass@localhost:5432/oilbar NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=https://example.com ZARINPAL_MERCHANT_ID=test-merchant SMSIR_API_KEY=test-key SMSIR_LINE_NUMBER=3000 SMSIR_TEMPLATE_ID=1000 next build
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-secret DATABASE_URL=postgres://user:pass@localhost:5432/oilbar NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=https://example.com ZARINPAL_MERCHANT_ID=test-merchant SMSIR_API_KEY=test-key SMSIR_LINE_NUMBER=3000 SMSIR_TEMPLATE_ID=1000 tsx --test tests/*.test.ts
